bill_title: authorize grants for the development of agricultural tourism and to make an appropriation therefor.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize grants for the development of agricultural tourism and to make an appropriation therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Tourism and State Development may award grants to local and regional organizations for planning, organizational, or operational purposes to promote the development of tourism related to agriculture in South Dakota. The department shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to establish eligibility and award criteria and procedures for grants authorized in this section. Section 2. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of twenty thousand dollars ($20,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of Tourism and State Development to provide grant funding to local and regional organizations to promote the development of tourism related to agriculture in South Dakota. Section 3. The secretary of the Department of Tourism and State Development shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 4. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2006, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
